statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagementSystem ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type, weight FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE recycling_bin = TRUE;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%' AND recycling_bin = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(weight) AS avg_weight, MAX(weight) AS max_weight, MIN(weight) AS min_weight FROM WasteManagementSystem;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementSystem ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE recycling_bin = TRUE ORDER BY weight ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, waste_type, recycling_bin FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE waste_type LIKE 'organic%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, weight FROM WasteManagementSystem WHERE recycling_bin = FALSE ORDER BY weight DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT id, collection_date FROM waste_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT center_name, location FROM recycling_center WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT collection_point FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS Total_Records FROM recycling_center;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT waste_type, collection_point FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_point = 'City Mall';
SELECT * FROM recycling_center WHERE location = 'Downtown' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT center_name, capacity FROM recycling_center WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT waste_type, collection_point, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE waste_type = 'Paper' AND collection_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteBins;
SELECT bin_location, capacity FROM WasteBins;
SELECT * FROM RecyclableItems WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, bin_id FROM RecyclableItems ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, disposal_date FROM WasteDisposalLogs WHERE bin_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteBins WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY bin_location DESC;
SELECT item_name, bin_location, disposal_date FROM RecyclableItems JOIN WasteDisposalLogs ON RecyclableItems.bin_id = WasteDisposalLogs.bin_id;
SELECT * FROM WasteBins WHERE bin_location LIKE '%Central%' ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT item_name, disposal_date FROM RecyclableItems JOIN WasteDisposalLogs ON RecyclableItems.item_id = WasteDisposalLogs.disposed_item_id WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT bin_location, MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM WasteBins GROUP BY bin_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT site_name, open_hours FROM waste_collection_sites ORDER BY open_hours DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE open_hours LIKE '8%';
SELECT site_name, open_hours FROM waste_collection_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_pickup_schedule WHERE pickup_frequency = 'Weekly' AND site_id = 3;
SELECT type_id, waste_type FROM waste_types WHERE recyclable = TRUE ORDER BY type_id ASC;
SELECT id, type_name, is_recyclable FROM WasteTypes WHERE id = 1
SELECT type_name, is_recyclable, id FROM WasteTypes WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes WHERE type_name LIKE 'Plastic%'
SELECT id, type_name FROM WasteTypes ORDER BY type_name DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes WHERE is_recyclable = FALSE
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes WHERE is_recyclable = TRUE
SELECT type_name FROM WasteTypes WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, type_name FROM WasteTypes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM WasteTypes WHERE type_name LIKE '%paper%' AND is_recyclable = TRUE
SELECT id, type_name FROM WasteTypes ORDER BY type_name DESC
